data.comment: The match has started.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 2, Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Romell Quioto for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick Orlando.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 18, Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
Montreal's Jorge Luis Corrales gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 36, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jukka Raitala for Montreal who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Montreal.
In the minute 39, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Daryl Dike.
Mauricio Pereyra instrumental with a fine assist.
Montrealâ€™s Jukka Raitala is on his feet again at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 42, Robert Sibiga signals a Montreal throw-in in Orlando's half.
Montreal's Bojan Krkic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orlando defender.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Red Bull Arena.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Orlando are pushing forward but Daryl Dike's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 52, Kyle Smith is booked for the away team.
Maciel of Montreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Robert Sibiga awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Thierry Henry (Montreal) is making a first substitution, with Amar Sejdic replacing Maciel.
The home team have replaced Jorge Luis Corrales with Anthony Jackson-Hamel. This is the second substitution made today by Thierry Henry.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
In the minute 57, The away team replace Mauricio Pereyra with Junior Urso.
Orlando make their second substitution with Ruan replacing Kamal Miller.
Montreal are coming forward and Bojan Krkic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 61, Orlando have a goal kick.
Orlando's Benji Michel is on target but unsuccessful.
Robert Sibiga awards Montreal a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Montreal in the half of Orlando.
Montreal's Bojan Krkic misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 67, Robert Sibiga waits before resuming play because Victor Wanyama for Montreal is still down.
Bojan Krkic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
Victor Wanyama is back on his feet again.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Orlando.
Orlando's Tesho Akindele attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 74, Orlando have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
Alexander Alvarado is replacing Tesho Akindele for Orlando at Red Bull Arena.
Mason Toye is on a sub for Samuel Piette for Montreal.
Robert Sibiga signals a throw-in for Montreal, close to Orlando's area.
In the minute 79, Montreal have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Orlando drives forward and Benji Michel gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Amar Sejdic for Montreal drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Orlando.
Orlando needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's fourth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Matheus Aias replacing Daryl Dike.
In the minute 86, Jhegson Mendez for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
Joey Dezart is replacing Benji Michel for the away team.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal push forward at Red Bull Arena and Bojan Krkic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orlando defence.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 89, Romell Quioto (Montreal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Montreal pushes forward through Amar Sejdic, whose finish on goal is saved.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Montreal's Jukka Raitala gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Orlando at Red Bull Arena.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
